pkgmetadata.longdescription:
lsp(1) is a terminal pager with a focus on manual pages.
It offers some assistance in handling manual pages:
* Navigation to other referenced manual pages. * Opening of any manual page by name. * Maintainance of several open manual pages in a session. * Experimental TOC mode that is helpful to show only sections and subsections of manual pages. * Creating a pseudo-file with the output of apropos. This could be useful especially for novice users: this can be used to search or read through all manual pages' short descriptions and immediately open interesting ones.
